Description.Details: Extra Target team reputation penalty for completing a specific objective
Description.Name: Objective Bonus Reputation Penalty

temporalNegativeResult: You lose {RES_VALUE.ToString} Reputation with [[TEAM_TAR,{TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}]] for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalPositiveResult: You gain {RES_VALUE.ToString} Reputation with [[TEAM_TAR,{TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}]] for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalSetResult: Your Reputation with [[TEAM_TAR,{TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}]] is now {RES_VALUE.ToString} for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
